title: Add FO-06 to navigation and overview
description:
Add FO-06 to the navigation config and overview page.

Files to modify:
- `lib/nav.config.ts` - Add FO-06 entry with appropriate description
- `app/overview/page.tsx` - Add FO-06 card/entry

Reference FO-05 entries for format and placement.

⚠️ Do not close until FO-06 appears in nav and overview page.
acceptance_criteria: FO-06 appears in navigation sidebar and on /overview page
closed_reason: Added FO-06 to nav.config.ts with Demo/Info children, added version card to overview page, and added row to comparison table
